  • Method Details

    • performCurrencyTransfer

      void performCurrencyTransfer (boolean chargeInvestor)
      Takes and gives currency from the players accordingly.
      Parameters:
      chargeInvestor - determines whether the investor will be charged for the transaction or not (If the type is NOT sell).

    • reverseCurrencyTransfer

      void reverseCurrencyTransfer()
      Reverses all transactions and returns all modified currency balanced to their original state before it was taken/given.

    • isCancelled

      boolean isCancelled()

    • setCancelled

      void setCancelled (boolean cancelled)

    • getPlayer

      org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayer()
      Returns:
      The player who initiated the economy call event.

    • setPlayer

      void setPlayer (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Sets the player who initiated the economy call event.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who initiated the event.

    • getRawAmount

      double getRawAmount()
      Returns:
      The base amount of currency (without tax applied).

    • getAmount

      double getAmount()
      Returns:
      The amount of currency the transaction is handling (Tax, defined in the config.yml, is applied automatically).

    • setAmount

      void setAmount (double amount)
      Sets the amount of currency the transaction is handling (Does NOT include tax).
      Parameters:
      amount - The raw amount of currency.

      boolean willSucceed()
      Tells if the transaction will succeed based on if the investor and producer can both complete it.
      Returns:
      If the transaction succeeded.
